review.comment: Nice twist with the smokiness.

review.comment: Fun and tasty! Loved the crunchy tempura.

review.author: Phyllis Vance
review.comment: Interesting combination, but I prefer traditional sushi.

review.comment: Interesting combination! Loved the cheeseburger twist.

data.description: Experience the best of both worlds with our Combo Pizza Taco. The perfect combination of taco and pizza flavors for a delightful meal.

review.comment: Decent burrito, but could use more seasoning.
